Tool

NameImport MOLA Grid (MEGDR)
ID8
Author(c) 2003 by O.Conrad

Description

Import Mars Orbit Laser Altimeter (MOLA) grids of the Mars Global Surveyor (MGS) Mission (Topographic maps, Mission Experiment Gridded Data Records - MEGDRs). Find more information and obtain free data from Mars Global Surveyor: MOLA (NASA)

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Output
Grid (*)Data Object (optional output)GRID
Options
FileFile pathFILE
Grid TypeChoiceTYPEAvailable Choices: [0] 2 byte integer [1] 4 byte floating point Default: 1
OrientationChoiceORIENTAvailable Choices: [0] normal [1] down under Default: 1
(*) optional
